document.docAuthor: Huber, John T., Read, Jennifer D. & Triapitsyn, Serguei V.
document.masterDocTitle: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

subSubSection.paragraph:
Nearctic hosts . Argidae :
Schizocerella pilicornis (Holmgren)
[the
Anaphes
reared from this host may not be
A. conotracheli
despite the fact that Girault identified it as such]. Curculionidae :
Conotrachelus nenuphar (Herbst)
,
C. schoofi Papp
,
Craponius inaequalis (Say)
,
Cylindrocopturus adspersus (LeConte)
.
Distribution . Canada : QC. USA : CT, GA, MD, MN, TX, UT.
